Reminders
The reminders tool will help you create handy notes that alert you based on datetime set by you.

On the reminders tool\'s home screen, you can select the group you want to view currently by selecting the appropriate icon with the group name underneath. Thereby, any reminders under the selected group will be displayed. Clicking on any of the reminders will allow you to edit them if necessary. If you wish to delete any reminders that you have already done, you can simply click the empty circle next to the reminder.

When you start creating a new Reminder, you can choose to either select a pre-existing group or create a new one. This is to provide a way to categorize each Reminder to tailor to your needs, allowing you to sort them accordingly as needed.
The Title of the Reminder will be what is displayed on notifications as well as on the Reminders. Subsequently, the Notes section allow you to input any additional information regarding the Reminder.
The Schedule date indicates the deadline of the Reminder, which is the date that the Repeat interval will be based upon. An alert is triggered on the day of the Schedule date as well.

The Reminders section allows you to add multiple date and time points, each of which will trigger an alert accordingly as well. These date/time points will be automatically re-calculated accordingly if the Reminder has a Repeat interval set.
The Repeat section allows you to select the interval that the Reminder will repeat again based on the Schedule date. You can also create a customized repeat interval if necessary.
The Ringtone section allows you to either turn on or off a ringtone that plays when the alert triggers. You can also set any .mp3 or .wav file from your system files as the ringtone.
Contacts
The contacts tool allows you to set contacts that you can easily call by double-tapping the contact portraits.
Clicking on the \"Choose Photo\" allows you to set a photo from your phone gallery for the contact.
The name and phone number will be associated with the contact subsequently.
You can easily edit the contact if necessary by clicking on the \"Edit Contact\" option.
Fences

The fences tool allows a caregiver account to set up geo-fences with the linked patient, allowing alerts to be sent if the patient leaves the fence. It requires the caregiver to link up with a patient first before it can be used.
Linking can be done through the options menu.
The UID must be from a patient account, once confirmed, the patient will receive an invitation to be linked.
The patients UID that is used for linking can be found in the hamburger menu.
The patient will receive an alert which can be accessed from the options menu. Any alerts if the patient leaves the fence is also displayed here.
By clicking on the alert, the patient can choose to either accept or decline the request.
Once linked, the caregiver can create a new fence by clicking on the centre button, and customize by dragging on the map, adjusting the radius as well as adding a tag name.

The caregiver can edit existing fences at anytime by clicking on the \"Manage Fences\" menu. Note patients will not be able to edit fences, and can only see them. You can also click on the locations in order to jump to them on the map.
